content:
本件保存
會員委設建庫 水 門石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
SDC - 5514
Aug. 3, 1962
.+
Mr. K. T. Li Secretary General Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject : Spare Parts for 6x6 GMC Truck US Surplus Supplies
Dear Mr. Li:
Transmitted herewith please find a list of spare parts for 6x6 GMC truck available at Taiwan Air Base, U.S. Air force. As we have secured a number of such trucks for our job use. It will be appreciated, if arrangement can be made by CUSA and AID to make the spare parts available for Shihmen Project.
Sincerely Yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.11.1Kg
基
W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.8. 7 15476
V.O. S G.
(2)
CUSA
Enclosure
cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, 继承, L
Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
國史饭 Academia Historica
₹
46

lines.content: 會員委設建庫 水 門石
Transmitted herewith please find a list of spare parts
for 6x6 GMC truck available at Taiwan Air Base, U.S. Air force.
As we have secured a number of such trucks for our job use. It
will be appreciated, if arrangement can be made by CUSA and AID
to make the spare parts available for Shihmen Project.

Transmitted herewith please find a list of spare parts for 6x6 GMC truck available at Taiwan Air Base, U.S. Air force. As we have secured a number of such trucks for our job use. It will be appreciated, if arrangement can be made by CUSA and AID to make the spare parts available for Shihmen Project.
